message.body: Hi honey! Made it to Detroit and waiting for flight to Ithaca, arriving at 4:45. I won't call in case you are sleeping or being discharged. I'm still hop
ing to come down on Tuesday if that is ok with you. I won't stay with you unless you want me to. Hotel if with Dad and with friends if Dad doesn't come w
ith me
Anything you want us to bring you from Wegmans?
I'll try to get the vitamin E capsules for your nipples
Pasta! Spaghetti & tricolor rontini. I'll have to think if there's anything else.
Are diapers cheaper here?
Ah! Just remembered you are not using disposables
Thin spaghetti or regular?
Yeah, and we have a good supply of disposables you start with.
Thin
Three boxes of each? Spaghetti and rotini
Sure, we'll eat tons, so whatever you want to carry.
Ok! At motor vehicle now - have to go
Would your cats eat the canned food that is is the garage? I'd be glad to bring that to you
Nah, I think that's special diet stuff for old cats.
##### is getting old
But I can give it to someone else
Stopped at Wegmans but forgot Vitamin E capsules
Bought 6 tricolor rigatoni at $1.39 per box
Bought five thin spaghetti at $1.79 per box
Bought one organic whole wheat spaghetti for $2.49
That's fine, I have several kinds of ointments for my nipples already.
Bought three Pampers Sensitive wipes on sale for $1.79, regular $2.49
I know you are using washcloths but you always need some disposable wipes for traveling
Annoyed that I can't get on the Internet at home
That's fine! I don't think we're starting cloth til I'm more healed anyway.
Have you heard from #####?
Not since just after #### was born
I'm dusting and scrubbing sinks but heading for bed soon. Will walk ##### first if she will come downstairs
She is camped outside of Dad's study, which is locked
I was gone all day with interns and taking care of registering the new Highlander and that may have annoyed him
I asked Dad for a key to the new door lock and he gave me his spare key to be copied so I made copies for each of you, too since #####'s keys were stolen
(including a set of her car keys) and ##### lost his key. I'll bring yours tomorrow
Ok. Feeding #### now & trying to sleep.
Raking ##### out now, I hope! Love you !
Please stop by when you get here! Just call when you get off the bus so we can be ready.
Hooray' will call assuming I have enough charge. At 23 per cent and plugged on
The driver just said we will be at the Cornell Club in 5 min
I think we'll be ready for visitors/help before too long. I slept well, hope ##### feels similarly.
I just left Dad at breakfast and headed to the park but will walk back to let him know :)
Dad said he will come in the afternoon
Let me know when when you're headed over here.
I'm walking across the park now:)
At the corner of 71 andMadisob
I'm here!
